Literature.Title: In vitro and in vivo antimicrobial activity of two alpha-helical cathelicidin peptides and of their synthetic analogs.
Literature.Author: Zanetti M, Pellegrini A, Gennaro R, Skerlavaj B, Benincasa M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium(MIC=4-16µM),Streptococcus agalactiae(MIC=4µM),Serratia marcescens(MIC=8->32µM),Escherichia coli O18:K1:H7 Bort(MIC=2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8µM)
